mapper.select: SELECT muser.user_id, muser.user_name, muser.phone_num, CONCAT_WS(':',dictType.dict_type_desc,uattr.attr_id) AS attr_id, CONCAT_WS(':',dict.dict_name,uattr.attr_value) AS attr_value FROM m_user_info muser LEFT JOIN t_user_attr uattr ON muser.user_id = uattr.user_id LEFT JOIN t_dict_data dict ON uattr.attr_value = dict.dict_value AND uattr.attr_id = dict.dict_type LEFT JOIN t_dict_type dictType ON uattr.attr_id = dictType.dict_type WHERE muser.is_delete = 0 AND uattr.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_enable = 0 AND dictType.is_delete = 0 AND dictType.is_enable = 0 AND muser.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY muser.user_id, uattr.attr_id

SELECT customer.user_id, customer.user_name, customer.phone_num, CONCAT_WS(':',dictType.dict_type_desc,uattr.attr_id) AS attr_id, CONCAT_WS(':',dict.dict_name,uattr.attr_value) AS attr_value FROM m_user_info muser, t_customer_relation relation LEFT JOIN m_user_info customer ON relation.customer_id = customer.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_attr uattr ON customer.user_id = uattr.user_id LEFT JOIN t_dict_data dict ON uattr.attr_id = dict.dict_type LEFT JOIN t_dict_type dictType ON uattr.attr_id = dictType.dict_type WHERE muser.is_delete = 0 AND customer.is_delete = 0 AND uattr.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_delete = 0 AND dict.is_enable = 0 AND dictType.is_delete = 0 AND dictType.is_enable = 0 AND muser.user_id = relation.user_id AND relation.is_relation = 0 AND muser.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} GROUP BY muser.user_id, customer.user_id, uattr.attr_id

NAME as dictUserLevel FROM m_user_info AS t1 LEFT JOIN t_dict_data AS t2 ON t1.user_type = t2.`value` AND t2.dict_type_id = 5 AND t2.delete_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN t_dict_data AS t3 ON t1.user_status = t3.`value` AND t3.dict_type_id = 6 AND t3.delete_flg = 0 LEFT JOIN t_dict_data AS t4 ON t1.user_level = t4.`value` AND t4.dict_type_id = 7 AND t4.delete_flg = 0 WHERE t1.is_delete = 0 and t1.user_id = #{userId}
